revision.text:
<!--우주인_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Astronaut
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종류 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 상태 | ontologyProperty = status }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 체류시간 | ontologyProperty = timeInSpace | unit = Time }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 선발 | ontologyProperty = selection }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 임무 | ontologyProperty = mission }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 은퇴일 | ontologyProperty = retired }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국적 | ontologyProperty = nationality }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생지 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망일 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 직업 | ontologyProperty = occupation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 현직업 | ontologyProperty = occupation }}
	{{ PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 부모 | ontologyProperty = parent }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 전직업 | ontologyProperty = occupation }}
end}}


<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|계급                = 군인일 경우 해당
-->
